Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

Properties.Description: Allow AWS AppSync to access dynamodb.
Allow AWS AppSync to write logs

Properties.Name: GraphQlFunctionConfigurationauthorizeFunction
Properties.ResponseMappingTemplate:
## Raise a GraphQL field error in case of a datasource invocation error
#if($ctx.error)
    $util.error($ctx.error.message, $ctx.error.type)
#end
## Pass back the result from DynamoDB. **
$util.toJson($ctx.result.data)

Properties.Name: GraphQlFunctionConfigurationupdateAccount
Properties.ResponseMappingTemplate:
## If there was an error with the invocation
## there might have been partial results
#if($ctx.error)
    ## Append a GraphQL error for that field in the GraphQL response
    $utils.appendError($ctx.error.message, $ctx.error.message)
#end
## Also returns data for the field in the GraphQL response
$util.toJson({
    "accountId": "${ctx.result.partitionKey}",
    "name": "${ctx.result.itemData.name}",
    "owner": "${ctx.result.owner}",
    "planId": "${ctx.result.itemData.planId}",
    "createdAt": "${ctx.result.createdAt}",
    "updatedAt": "${ctx.result.updatedAt}"
})

## If there was an error with the invocation
## there might have been partial results
#if($ctx.error)
    ## Append a GraphQL error for that field in the GraphQL response
    $utils.appendError($ctx.error.message, $ctx.error.message)
#end
## Also returns data for the field in the GraphQL response
$utils.toJson($ctx.result)

## If there was an error with the invocation
## there might have been partial results
#if($ctx.error)
    ## Append a GraphQL error for that field in the GraphQL response
    $utils.appendError($ctx.error.message, $ctx.error.message)
#end
## Also returns data for the field in the GraphQL response
$util.toJson($ctx.prev.result)
